text:
Includes a side of Italian Salad with our in-house red wine vinaigrette and fresh homemade bread.

Classic Calabrese Spaghetti & Meatballs 24.95 Homemade Calabrese-style meatballs braised in rich marinara sauce and served over a bed of pasta.
Italian Stuffed Sweet Pepper 27.95 Bell pepper stuffed with a Calabrese-style meat and ricotta cheese mixture, smothered in a rich marinara and topped with melted mozzarella and served with pasta.
Pork Cutlet 27.95 Lightly breaded pork cutlet smothered in our savory marinara sauce and topped with melted mozzarella cheese. Served with a side of pasta (penne, spaghetti or rigatoni).
Spinach Manicotti 29.95 Two large manicottis with fresh spinach, herbs, ricotta cheese and marinara, baked to perfection.
Chicken Cacciatore 27.95 Fall off the bone chicken, slow-cooked in a vegetable broth rich in herbs and vegetables, served on a bed of pasta.
Shrimp Stuffed Jumbo Shells 29.95 Fresh shrimp, spinach and ricotta cheese stuffed into two jumbo shells and topped with marinara and melted mozzarella cheese.
Seafood Lasagna 32.95 Crab, scallop & shrimp with herbs and vegetables all combined in a rich cream sauce.
Chicken Parmesan 27.95 Breaded chicken breast smothered in our marinara and topped with mozzarella cheese, served with pasta.
Calabrese-Style Meat Lasagna 28.95 Ricotta cheese, herbed ground beef prepared Calabrese-style, slow-baked in rich cheeses and marinara.
Gnocchi and Marinara 25.95 Hand-crafted gnocchi with herbs - absolutely the best! Served with our in-house marinara sauce.

ZUPA E INSALATE (Soups and Salads)

Italian Salad $12.95 / L $16.95 Romaine lettuce, red onion, tomato and cucumber tossed in our homemade Italian dressing.
Caesar Salad $12.95 / L $18.95 Romaine lettuce, bacon and house-made croutons tossed in creamy Caesar dressing and sprinkled with parmesan cheese.
Tomato Salad $14.95 / L $18.95 Vine ripened tomatoes, red onion, green pepper and fresh basil tossed in a homemade olive oil dressing rich in herbs and sprinkled with fresh oregano.
Tortellini Soup $14.95 / L $17.95 Meat filled tortellini in a rich Calabrese-style vegetable and chicken broth.
ANTIPASTI (Appetizers)

Antipasto Plate 24.95 Homemade Italian bread toasted with a rich garlic butter and cheese.
Calabrese Bruschetta 14.95 Homemade Italian bread with a generous serving of our bruschetta mixture including olives, tomatoes, peppers, sweet basil, red onion, parmesan and drizzled with melted mozzarella cheese.
Garlic Bread 6.95 Homemade Italian bread baked with a rich garlic butter and cheese.
Deep Fried Ravioli 16.95 Lightly breaded ravioli deep-fried and served with marinara sauce.
Breaded Calamari 16.95 Lightly breaded calamari rings deep-fried and served with marinara sauce.
Mozzarella Sticks 17.95 Lightly breaded mozzarella sticks served with marinara sauce.
Shrimp Cocktail 16.95 Fresh jumbo shrimp, chilled and served with a delicious tangy cocktail sauce and fresh lemon.
GOURMET PIZZA E PANZAROTTO

All pizzas and panzarottos include mozzarella cheese. You may choose additional toppings with prices which are included in the price.

Pizza 12" $22.95
Panzarotto 19.95
Additional Toppings 1.50 each
Green Olives | Black Olives | Green Pepper | Red Pepper | White Onion

Premium Toppings 2.00 each
Sun Dried Tomatoes | Artichoke | Pancetta | Hot Peppers | Sausage | Sopressata
name: La Casa Nostra Ristorante
